scripts.docker:platform:win: docker volume rm instant & docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock  --mount='type=volume,src=instant,dst=/instant' --network host jembi/platform:latest
scripts.docker:platform:aws: docker volume rm instant ; docker run -it --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --mount='type=volume,src=instant,dst=/instant' --network host -v ~/.aws:/root/.aws jembi/platform:latest
